# Select

`Select` is a form component lets users choose options from an options menu.

## Usage

```jsx live
import { Select } from "@wp-g2/components"

function Example() {
  return (
    <Select>
      <option>Ana</option>
      <option>Elsa</option>
      <option>Kristoff</option>
      <option>Olaf</option>
    </Select>
  )
}
```
